sentences.en: Business range: jeans , skirts , pants, fatter's clothing s, Dress and denim fabrics.
sentences.cn: 主要生产经营: 系列牛仔布, 少女装,短裤, 裤子, 肥婆裤,童装等.

sentences.en: China is a country producing denim a great quantity.
sentences.cn: 中国是牛仔布的生产大国,但远非生产强国.

sentences.en: Denim was also worn with tweed or a dash of evening attire.
sentences.cn: 粗斜棉布衣服同样可以跟粗花呢衣服配套穿着,或是配上一件小巧的晚装.

sentences.en: Dennis was dressed in denim jeans.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯穿了一条劳动布牛仔裤。

sentences.en: Except the jeans, we have denim dress, knitted top, T shirt etcs.
sentences.cn: 除名式牛仔裤外, 亦有设计时尚的牛仔裙及上衣.针织上衣和T-恤等.

sentences.en: He has on a denim shirt with a T-shirt underneath.
sentences.cn: 他穿了一件牛仔衬衫,里面套了件T恤.

sentences.en: Jeans, the all-purpose denim trousers, have been around for over a hundred years.
sentences.cn: 牛仔裤，这种适合各种用途的斜纹粗棉布裤子，已经有一百多年历史了。

sentences.en: Now our work clothes are no longer made of denim.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作服现在已经不是用劳动布做的了.

sentences.en: She wore pale blue denim shorts and a white denim work shirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一条淡蓝色的斜纹粗棉布短裤,一件白粗布工作服上衣.

sentences.en: Sourcing new Garment suppliers for various woven, knit and denim garment.
sentences.cn: 能开发新的针织,梭织,牛仔等服装生产厂商.

sentences.en: Strong technica knowledge in knit, denim and outerwear, familiar with denim washing.
sentences.cn: 在针织, 牛仔及外套方面有丰富的经验, 对牛仔洗水熟悉.

sentences.en: The cable and lampshade are the material inspired by denim.
sentences.cn: 有线和灯罩的物质激励牛仔.

sentences.en: Through denim uppers, Non - slip soles dichotomanthes, Breathable and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 牛仔鞋面, 防滑牛筋鞋底, 舒适透气.

sentences.en: Wear sequins and bright colours, tailoring, denim ( especially dark ) and fashion - forward accessories.
sentences.cn: 要穿有磨损亮片和明亮色彩缝制的牛仔 ( 尤其是深色 ) 和时尚配件.

sentences.en: Will denim jeans ever go out of date?
sentences.cn: 粗布牛仔裤会过时 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 斜纹粗棉布，牛仔布，工装裤
trans.tran_en: a type of strong cotton cloth used especially to make  jean s
